metadata.title: Olha & Ivan's Baby Reveal | Gender Reveal Celebration
metadata.description: Join Olha and Ivan as they reveal the gender of their first baby! Participate in the guessing game, RSVP for the celebration, and share in the joy.
metadata.keywords: gender reveal, baby announcement, Olha Ivan, pregnancy celebration

hero.title: Baby Reveal
hero.subtitle: Olha & Ivan
hero.message1: We're excited to share some wonderful news ‚Äî we (Olha and Ivan) are expecting our first child!
hero.message2: Although we'll be holding a small gender reveal celebration with close family, we want to make sure that those of you who are far away can still be part of this special moment.
hero.message3: So we've prepared a little game to include everyone in the fun ‚Äî stay tuned and join us in guessing whether it's a boy or a girl!

guessing.sectionSubtitle: Join the excitement and make your prediction!
guessing.messagePlaceholder: Share your reasoning, excitement, or well wishes...

rsvp.sectionSubtitle: Let us know if you can be part of our special day!
rsvp.messagePlaceholder: Share your excitement, dietary requirements, or any special messages...
rsvp.confirmationAttending: Thank you for confirming your attendance! We can't wait to celebrate with you!
rsvp.confirmationNotAttending: We'll miss you, but we understand. We'll share photos and updates with you!

gallery.sectionSubtitle: Capturing precious moments along the way

reveal.sectionSubtitle: The moment we've all been waiting for!
reveal.revealMessageBoy: Olha and Ivan are absolutely thrilled to announce that their little bundle of joy is a beautiful baby boy!
reveal.revealMessageGirl: Olha and Ivan are absolutely thrilled to announce that their little bundle of joy is a beautiful baby girl!
reveal.thankYouMessage: Thank you all for being part of this incredible journey with us. Your love and support mean everything! ‚ú®
reveal.thankYouAll: From the bottom of our hearts, thank you for joining us on this incredible journey. Your love, support, and excitement mean the world to us.
reveal.waitingForMoment: The moment we've all been waiting for! The gender reveal will happen during our celebration.
reveal.newYearSurprise: The most exciting New Year's Eve surprise! üéÜ
reveal.stayTuned: Stay tuned - this page will update with the big news!
reveal.demoText: Demo: Click to see the reveal animation
reveal.canShareJoyWith: We can't wait to introduce our little {gender} to all of you when {pronoun} arrives!

footer.madeWith: Made with love for our little miracle
footer.copyright: ¬© 2024 Olha & Ivan's Baby Reveal. Every moment is precious. üí´
